definitions.definition: A defensive or deflective action; an act of parrying.
A simple defensive action designed to deflect an attack, performed with the forte of the blade.

A defensive move intended to change the direction of an incoming strike to make it miss its intended target, rather than block and absorb it; and typically performed with an open hand in a downward or sideways slapping motion.

main_definition: A defensive or deflective action; an act of parrying.
secondary_definitions: ( fencing ) A simple defensive action designed to deflect an attack, performed with the forte of the blade.

( combat sports and martial arts ) A defensive move intended to change the direction of an incoming strike to make it miss its intended target, rather than block and absorb it; and typically performed with an open hand in a downward or sideways slapping motion.
